record.title: LRO LUNAR EXPLORATION NEUTRON DETECTOR 4/5 RDR V1.0
record.description: Calibrated or converted housekeeping and scientific data collected from the Lunar Exploration Neutron Detector aboard the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; CALORIMETER/SPECTROMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; LEND; LUNAR EXPLORATION NEUTRON DETECTOR

record.title: LRO LUNAR EXPLORATION NEUTRON DETECTOR 2 EDR V1.0
record.description: Raw, uncalibrated housekeeping and scientific data collected from the Lunar Exploration Neutron Detector (LEND) aboard the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; CALORIMETER/SPECTROMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; LEND; LUNAR EXPLORATION NEUTRON DETECTOR

record.title: LRO DLRE LEVEL 2 EDR V1.0
record.description:
This data set consists of the Diviner Lunar Radiometer Experiment uncalibrated observations, also known as EDRs. The DLRE is a surface pushbroom mapper that measures emitted thermal radiation and reflected solar radiation from the surface of the moon.
Two Diviner solar channels measure 0.3-3 micrometers reflected solar radiation. Three Diviner channels near 8 micrometers classify regolith mineralogy by mapping the location of the Christiansen feature. The remaining four Diviner channels measure surface temperature in four spectral bands ranging from 12.5 micrometers to beyond 200 micrometers.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADIOMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; DLRE; DIVINER LUNAR RADIOMETER EXPERIMENT

record.title: LRO MOON LASER ALTIMETER 3 RADR V1.0
record.description:
This data set contains archival radiometric data derived from reduced altimetry measured by the Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter instrument during LRO's Nominal Mission. LOLA is a pulse detection, time-of-flight laser altimeter that measures the distance between the LRO spacecraft and the surface of the Moon.
LOLA transmits a 5-spot pattern, thus providing 5 simultaneous profiles across the lunar surface whose separation depends on spacecraft altitude. LOLA also measures the energy of the return pulses, which enables the calculation of the surface albedo after calibration.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; LASER ALTIMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; LOLA; LUNAR ORBITER LASER ALTIMETER

record.title: LRO MOON LASER ALTIMETER 2 EDR V1.0
record.description: This data set contains archival raw experiment data from the Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter instrument (LOLA).
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; LASER ALTIMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; LOLA; LUNAR ORBITER LASER ALTIMETER

record.title: LRO MOON MINI-RF 1 PACKETIZED DATA RECORD V1.0
record.description: This data set contains archival raw data acquired from the Mini-RF instrument during the LRO mission.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADAR MAPPER; LRO; SATELLITE; MRFLRO; MINI-RF LRO

record.title: LRO MOON LASER ALTIMETER 4 GDR V1.0
record.description: This data set contains gridded data products from the Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter instrument [SMITHETAL2009].
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; LASER ALTIMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; LOLA; LUNAR ORBITER LASER ALTIMETER

record.title: LRO DLRE 5 POLAR RESOURCE PRODUCT
record.description:
This data set consists of the Diviner Lunar Radiometer Experiment Polar Resource Products also known as PRPs. The DLRE is a surface pushbroom mapper that measures emitted thermal radiation and reflected solar radiation from the surface of the moon.
Two Diviner solar channels measure 0.3-3 micrometers reflected solar radiation. Three Diviner channels near 8 micrometers classify regolith mineralogy by mapping the location of the Christiansen feature. The remaining four Diviner channels measure surface temperature in four spectral bands ranging from 12.5 micrometers to beyond 200 micrometers.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADIOMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; DLRE; DIVINER LUNAR RADIOMETER EXPERIMENT

record.title: LRO MOON MINI-RF 4 CALIBRATED DATA RECORD V1.0
record.description: This data set contains Level 1 archival calibrated burst mode data acquired from the Mini-RF instrument during the LRO mission and associated ancillary data.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADAR MAPPER; LRO; SATELLITE; MRFLRO; MINI-RF LRO

record.title: LRO MOON MINI-RF 5 POLAR MOSAIC CALIBRATED DATA REC V1.0
record.description: This data set contains lunar polar mosaics composed of calibrated data acquired from the Mini-RF instrument during the LRO mission. The mosaics are made from data collected during multiple orbits.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADAR MAPPER; LRO; SATELLITE; MRFLRO; MINI-RF LRO

record.title: LRO MOON MINI-RF 2/3/5 BISTATIC RADAR V2.0
record.description: This data set contains radar data of the lunar surface from bistatic measurements utilizing the Arecibo Observatory transmitter and LRO Mini-RF receiver.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADAR MAPPER; LRO; SATELLITE; MRFLRO; MINI-RF LRO

record.title: LRO DLRE 5 GRIDDED DATA RECORDS
record.description:
This data set consists of the Diviner Lunar Radiometer Experiment Gridded Data Records also known as GDRs. The DLRE is a surface pushbroom mapper that measures emitted thermal radiation and reflected solar radiation from the surface of the moon.
Two Diviner solar channels measure 0.3-3 micrometers reflected solar radiation. Three Diviner channels near 8 micrometers classify regolith mineralogy by mapping the location of the Christiansen feature. The remaining four Diviner channels measure surface temperature in four spectral bands ranging from 12.5 micrometers to beyond 200 micrometers.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADIOMETER; LRO; SATELLITE; DLRE; DIVINER LUNAR RADIOMETER EXPERIMENT

record.title: LRO MOON RADIO SCIENCE RAW TRACKING DATA V1.0
record.description: This data set contains archival raw, partially processed, and ancillary/supporting radio science data acquired during the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter (LRO) mission. The radio observations were carried out using the LRO spacecraft and Earth-based stations of the commercial Universal Space Network (USN), the Ka-band ground station at White Sands, New Mexico (WS1), and the Next Generation Satellite Laser Ranging station in Greenbelt, Maryland (NGSLR). Additional data were provided by the NASA Deep Space Network (DSN) during commissioning. Ongoing participation by the International Laser Ranging Service (ILRS) network of stations provides further LR data that are processed by the Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter (LOLA) Science Operations Center (SOC). Of most interest are likely to be the Tracking Data Files in the TRK directory.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADIO SCIENCE; LRO; SATELLITE; RSS; RADIO SCIENCE SUBSYSTEM

record.title: LRO MOON MINI-RF 5 MAP-PROJECTED CALIBRATED DATA REC V1.0

record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; RADAR MAPPER; LRO; SATELLITE; MRFLRO; MINI-RF LRO

record.description: This data set contains spherical harmonic topographic (shape) and gravity potential models from the Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter instrument, LRO Laser Ranging, and radio tracking.

record.title: LRO DLRE 5 GLOBAL CUMULATIVE PRODUCTS
record.description:
This data set consists of the Diviner Lunar Radiometer Experiment Global Cumulative Products (GCPs) and Polar Cumulative Products (PCPs). The DLRE is a surface pushbroom mapper that measures emitted thermal radiation and reflected solar radiation from the surface of the moon.
Two Diviner solar channels measure 0.3-3 micrometers reflected solar radiation. Three Diviner channels near 8 micrometers classify regolith mineralogy by mapping the location of the Christiansen feature. The remaining four Diviner channels measure surface temperature in four spectral bands ranging from 12.5 micrometers to beyond 200 micrometers.
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; LRO; SATELLITE

record.title: LRO MOON MINI-RF 5 GLOBAL MOSAIC V1.0
record.description: This data set contains global uncontrolled mosaics of the Moon in simple cylindrical projection. The images are derived from the LRO Mini-RF Map-projected Calibrated Data Records (PDS data set ID LRO-L-MRFLRO-5-CDR-MAP- V1.0).
record.keywords: LUNAR RECONNAISSANCE ORBITER; MOON; LRO; SATELLITE
